title: Blended Mathematics Learning Design Program for Adult Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customized design emphasizing applicability for current practitioners, including strategies to enhance social presence for active online interaction.

learning_goals: Learners can solve work-related math problems with 80% accuracy
Learners can engage in meaningful interactions with peers via online discussion boards at least twice weekly
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans in blended learning environments and achieve over 90% implementation rates
Learners can apply learned math concepts to real-world tasks at least three times within three months after class completion

resources: Digital Tools for Math Practice (e.g., GeoGebra)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
